Hi all,
Thank u @jarland for allowing everyone to post in offers for cybermonday.

My first offer..
I am offering 1000MB shared space in US server.

Order my starter plan with $10 per annum and get free upgrade to SPECIAL 1000MB plan. If someone faces any payment problem with 2co, just register and wait. Your space will be ready even via manual setup.

[https://billing.ethwebs.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=8](https://billing.ethwebs.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=8)
